description: A grand tourer that blurs the line between luxury and performance. The Midnight Coupe's twin-turbo V6 delivers smooth, effortless power while the cabin wraps you in comfort. It's the car for people who want to go very fast without breaking a sweat.
lore: Named for the color of the sky when it's at its best â€” 2 AM on a clear night, cruising Harbor Expressway with the T-tops off. The Midnight Coupe isn't the fastest car in its tier, but it might be the most satisfying to drive. Effortless speed with a V6 soundtrack.
